template.name: ngapp
template.value:
<script type="text/javascript" src="${contextPath}/views/js/lib/angularJs/angular.1.6.4.min.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    var $appName$App = angular.module("$appName$App", []);
    $appName$App.service("$appName$Service", function($http){
        this.fetchData = function(){
          return $http.get("test.action", {});  
        };
    });
    $appName$App.controller("$appName$Controller", function($scope, $appName$Service){
        
        $appName$Service.fetchData().then(function(response){
           console.log(response.data);
           
        });
    });
</script>
